info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 11:25PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern La Salle and northwestern McMullen Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1125 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Zella, or 15 miles east of Dilley, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Zella, Fowlerton and Los Angeles. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for south Texas.
